sentences.en: Art is the stored honey of the human soul, gathered on wings of misery and travail.
sentences.cn: 艺术是人类灵魂中沉淀的蜂蜜, 只有通过痛苦和辛劳才能获得.

sentences.en: Ask ye now, and see whether a man doth travail with child?
sentences.cn: 6你们且访问看看,男人有产难 吗 .

sentences.en: Ce travail ne lui convient pas , parce qu'il n'est pas assez fort en fran? ais.
sentences.cn: 17他的法文不好, 因而这工作对他不适合.

sentences.en: D é sormais, chaque Fran ? ais qui reprendra un travail sera encourag é , valoris é, r é compens é.
sentences.cn: 今后,每个重返工作岗位的人将受到鼓励, 看重以及补偿.

sentences.en: He did whatever he could to ease their travail.
sentences.cn: 他为减轻他们的辛劳做了力所能及的一切。

sentences.en: He gained the medal through his painful travail.
sentences.cn: 他通过艰辛的努力获得了奖牌.

sentences.en: He hath builded against me, and compassed me with gall and travail.
sentences.cn: 5他筑垒攻击我, 用苦楚(原文作苦胆)和艰难围困我.

sentences.en: I have seen the travail that God has given the children of men to travail in.
sentences.cn: 10我见神将辛劳给世人,使他们在其中操劳.

sentences.en: In travail and conflict of soul He prayed for His disciples.
sentences.cn: 他在心灵的痛苦挣扎之余,恳切地为门徒祈求.

sentences.en: KJV Fear took hold upon them there, and pain, as of a woman in travail.
sentences.cn: [新译]他们在那里战栗恐惧;他们痛苦好像妇人分娩时一样.

sentences.en: Mothers know the travail of giving birth to a child.
sentences.cn: 母亲们了解分娩时的痛苦.

sentences.en: My children, with whom I travail again in birth until Christ is formed in you.
sentences.cn: 我的孩子们, 我为你们再受生产之苦,直等到基督成形在你们里面.

sentences.en: Nixon , whatever his travail, would see it through.
sentences.cn: 尼克松置他的痛苦处境于不顾, 坚决要把这件事干到底.

sentences.en: Teaching them to think seemed at times like the travail of childbirth.
sentences.cn: 他教导学生思考,就好比怀孕妇人经历分娩的阵痛一样.

sentences.en: The team, despite their recent travails, are still in the game.
sentences.cn: 这支运动队，尽管近来遇到了难题，但还没有出局。

sentences.en: Worlds in travail, that the meanest flower might blow.
sentences.cn: 连最不起眼的小花要开放,世界也得经历阵痛.

trans.tran_cn: <文>艰苦劳动，辛勤努力，痛苦，分娩的阵痛
trans.tran_en: a difficult or unpleasant situation, or very tiring work

trans.tran_cn: 辛勤努力；经受分娩的阵痛
